name: Shooting Gallery (Corbois\Mein Home)
overview: Released in March 1985 by HC - Mein Home-Computer and Courbois Software, this crosshairs shooter was a matter of timing the shot for targeting animals of different speeds. Foxes, rabbits, ducks and wild boars run past the shooting gallery as small metal plates at different speeds. It means reacting at lightning speed when they are in their sights.
